channel.title: Vignettes on Scillus
channel.description: Recent content in Vignettes on Scillus

item.title: Installation
item.description: Scillus is still undergoing active development. Please use the following code to install the development branch on GitHub: install.packages("devtools") library(devtools) install_github("xmc811/Scillus", ref = "development") library(Scillus) Note: Errors may occur during the installation of dependency packages. Usually it can be solved by re-installing the relevant packages. If you would like to check the source code on GitHub, don't forget switching to the development branch.
